subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson will be part of a threesome, with Graeme McDowell, off the 10th tee in the first round of the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship on Thursday.
snippet: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson will be part of a threesome, with Graeme McDowell, off the 10th tee in the first round of the W.G.C.-Cadillac Championship on Thursday.
